https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2y7SSK9QwPxmvnA0kGP62EBzEmb.jpg Natsuki takes care of her young autistic brother. She then meets her old childhood friend and falls in love, unfortunately he suffers from a serious illness. Days with You
